entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OpenApi doesn't convert query params to snake_case #60936
  • The `NegotiationResponse` object is incorrectly deserialized with the `NegotiateProtocol.ParseResponse` API #60935
  • Hybrid Cache silently fails to correctly handle cached tuples #60934
  • Second ASP.NET HTTP Response Time takes +30 seconds #60933
  • ASP.NET gRPC service in IIS10 does propagate gRPC status codes #60929
  • Perf regression: updates #60928
  • Race Condition in SQL Server Distributed Cache with Transactional Operations #60923

Closed

  • OpenAPI with two collections of same type generates weird internal ref #60931
  • Building Blazor WASM with dotnet 9.0.2 on Mac M2 fails with runtime pack error #60917
  • Perf regression: mvc #60921
  • Why can't I know if SSE is disconnected? #60927
  • MapStaticAssets breaks endpoint routing in container #59964
  • [Authorize] attribute denies anonymous users, but setting any properties (like roles) does not #60553

PullRequests

Created

  • Add default implementation to OpenAPI's new Description property to prevent a breaking change #60937
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Improve flaky tests, move tests blockade. #60930
    test-failure, area-blazor, .NET 10 Planning

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7218908` to `4902ea2` #60932
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2662572 #60872
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview3
  • Bundle the .NET Runtime in the archives in the VMR as well #60905
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add doc owners column to area owners table #60818
    area-infrastructure
  • Add `NotFound` method in `NavigationManager` for interactive and static rendering #60752
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • [Infrastructure] Updated npm packages 2025-03-13 #60918
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix `RadioButtonGetsResetAfterSubmittingEnhancedForm` #60920
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation
  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc
  • Only build the target platform in native projs for the VMR #60910
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF migration and NullReferenceException #35792
  • Why do the results returned by the full query and projection query differ after the tracked entity is modified in Entity Framework Core? #35790
  • Let me opt out from convention which treats Id property of an owned entity as a primary key. #35789

Closed

  • Problem generating ContextModelSnapshot #35747

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #32192 - Remove lookup of JsonTypeMapping via JsonElement #35788

Merged

  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix to #21006 - Support a default value for non-nullable properties #35782
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.x
  • Fix readme #35791
  • Make IsAsyncData readonly and use collection initializers #35786

Updated

  • Add support for complex type discriminator. #35744

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ToolbarItems Tooltip wrong theme #28421
  • SearchBar focus/unfocus do not fire on Windows #28419
  • [Mac Catalyst] `NullReferenceException` in `DragAndDropDelegate` #28416
  • [9.0.50] CollectionView display is broken when setting IsVisible after items are added #28415
  • [iOS] Popping a page includes an unexpected page in the NavigationStack when the underlying page's OnAppearing method is called #28414
  • Maui 9 support armeabi-v7a ? #28413
  • [iOS] [MacCatalyst] Provide an API through which SetNeedsLayout can be intercepted when InvalidateMeasure is invoked #28410
  • [testing] Enable back CheckEntitlementsForMauiBlazorOnMacCatalyst #28408
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Android: JAVAC : warning : [options] source value 8 is obsolete and will be removed in a future release #28406
  • Borderless Picker in Android and List of text should highlight #28404
  • [9.0.50] MissingMethodException when using CommunityToolkit.Maui.Views.PopupExtensions.ShowPopupAsync #28402

Closed

  • [Emulator/Android Hardware] Microsoft.Maui.Controls update crashes Community Toolkit Popups #28422
  • ApplyStyleSheets() Causes Exception: System.InvalidOperationException: Collection was modified; enumeration operation may not execute #28235
  • Maui iOS from Windows aren't detecting my phisical iPhone #28392
  • Label crashes on Windows due to infinite loop when using FormattedText #28171
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid Android Release: 'BlazorWebView' Fails [8.0.0 preview.5.8529] #16792
  • Android AND IOS Apps crashes in Release Build when activating theTrimMode Switch #28082
  • SharpHook can work #27218
  • Issue with .Net Maui. ShellContent OnSelected property doesnt exist. #28142

PullRequests

Created

  • [Mac Catalyst] `NullReferenceException` in `DragAndDropDelegate` - FIX #28417
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Make IShape in MauiCALayer a WeakReference #28412
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 7 #28409
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix: Prevent Duplicate MapSource Invocations on setting Image's Source to Local File Paths #28405
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • [Windows, Android] Resolved issue with dynamic Header/Footer reassignment in CollectionView. #28403
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android, iOS] Dynamically setting SearchHandler Query property does not update text in the search box #28400
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 6 #28399
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Stepper allows incrementing beyond the maximum value #28398
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • Made sudo optional for Linux jdk provisioning #28195
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.6.5 to 1.6.6 #28338
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [testing] Disable CheckEntitlementsForMauiBlazorOnMacCatalyst #28407
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, testing-reenable, testing-green-ci, .NET 9 SR6
  • [ci] Cleanup the provisionator Xcode script #28395
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR6
  • Update bug-report.yml #28394
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix for CursorPosition Property Not Applied Correctly to Entry Control #27220
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed Label Visibility Issue on macOS and iOS #28081
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix SafeArea management on iOS #28283
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Improve iOS CollectionView performance by leveraging the new platform level invalidation mechanism #28225

    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 3 #28103
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] - Fix Inconsistent Footer Scrolling Behaviour in CollectionView with EmptyView #28107

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers do not find issues in VSTO Excel Add-in #77609
    .NET 10
  • IntelliSense completion of identifiers that match reserved words should use `@` in C# #77606
    Backlog

Closed

  • IDE0306 triggers for invalid case and the fix generate wrong code #77596
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35913.39 #77601

PullRequests

Created

  • Extensions: flesh out behavior for some pattern-based binding scenarios #77608
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Revert "Update Versions.props for Dev18" #77605
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Relax signature collision rules for static extension methods #77603
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Attempt to further reduce thread switches during package load. #77602
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Move feature-oriented helpers to appropriate location #77611
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77616
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade to VSSDK.BuildTools 17.14.1043-preview2 #77580
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure we don't touch Solution.Workspace if we don't have to #77581
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add feature flag controlling Copilot prompt in Semantic Search #77562
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow modification of source generated documents #77587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add more modern-extension FAR tests #77503
    Area-IDE, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Add RuntimeAsyncMethodGenerationAttribute #77543
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Program incorrectly handles crypto key when running under Linux .NET 9 but is fine under .NET 8 #113555
  • Test failure in RunReflectionScenario_UnsafeRead #113553
    10.0.0
  • Having a problem with build-time generated Json Serialization Contexts - new ones added in this update don't get built #113549
  • Question: Enforcing Explicit IOptions<T> Registration to Prevent Silent Defaults #113547
  • Test Failure: superpmi-asmdiffs-checked-release for smoke_tests.nativeaot #113546
    10.0.0
  • CreateSubKey(string, RegistryKeyPermissionCheck, RegistrySecurity?) ignores its third argument #113538
  • Appears Blazor SIMD builds now work on non-SIMD architecture - need confirmation #113537
  • OpenSubKey(string, RegistryRights) is useless #113535
  • `Assembly.GetType(string, bool, bool)` throws unexpected `FileLoadException` on NET9 #113534
  • HTTP/2 pings don't work if the connection lifetime is zero #113532
    Future
  • double.TryParse string "Infinity" behave different on gh action runner/codespaces #113530
  • Disk write performance difference when calling FlushAsync() vs specifying FileOptions.WriteThrough #113526
  • [API Proposal]: Add QUERY verb support to HttpClient #113522
  • [NativeAOT] Unexpected GetInterfaceMap Results #113521
  • Unified Embedded .NET Solution #113518
  • Mono: Call Instrumentation Flags Conflict Between Multiple Mono Profilers #113514
  • Test failure: JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Serialization/Deserialize/Deserialize.dll #113510
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/ComWrappers/API/ComWrappersTestsBuiltInComDisabled/ComWrappersTestsBuiltInComDisabled.cmd #113509
  • Add ML-KEM #113508
    10.0.0
  • Add SLH-DSA #113506
    10.0.0
  • Add Composite ML-DSA #113505
    10.0.0

Closed

  • JIT: Bad result with shifts on arm32/x86 #113487
    10.0.0
  • X509Certificate.CreateFromSignedFile(assemblyPath) is depricated but X509CertificateLoader fails #113552
  • [API Proposal]: Provide trim-safe overload for `ValidationContext` construction #113134
    10.0.0
  • Continued Issue with System.Memory 4.6.0 and NUnit in .NET Framework 4.7.2 #113368
    10.0.0
  • HttpClient false-negative dependency traces #86094
    10.0.0
  • Host doesn't always react to cancellation if services are started concurrently #113495
    10.0.0
  • `Type.Equals(Type)` is not consistent with `Type.Equals(object)` when using modified types #113361
  • PEReader does not throw BadImageFormatException for some invalid PE files #48419
    10.0.0
  • ServiceProvider.GetServices() Returns Results Based on Last GetKeyedServices() Call #111795
    10.0.0
  • Add post quantum algorithm support #108331
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Non-generic Tensor base type #111968
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: GetPinnedHandle for tensors #111966
    10.0.0
  • Obsolete message on SslStream is wrong #110600
    10.0.0
  • Allow to Specify HttpClientHandler in IHttpClientFactory #110009
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't call fgMorphBlockStmt in LoopClonning #113558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move macro definition to give better out-of-the-box VSCode experience on Windows #113557
    area-VM-coreclr, dev-innerloop
  • performance pipelines triggers unified #113556
    perf-pipeline, needs-area-label
  • Fix a synchronization bug in System.Diagnostics.ActivitySource #113554
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 10.0.0
  • Remove redundant nullable annotation #113550
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [9.0] Update openssl dependency for openSUSE #113548
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Disable SendAsync_ReuseRequestInHandler_ResetsHeadersForEachReuse on WASM #113543
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix double dispose of GCHandle in BrowserWebSocket #113541
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Net, os-browser, 9.0.x
  • Fix AcquireCredentialHandle parameter lifetime #113540
    area-System.Net.Security
  • skip MonoLLVMSDKDebugSuffix for local build #113536
    area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • Reenable dumps on stack overflow test children #113533
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [browser] test that Task.Yield yields to browser event loop #113531
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use `GetUninitializedObject` to marshal LayoutClass #113529
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • new System.Net.Http.EnableMetrics switch #113528
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [WinHTTP] Let OS chose SSL/TLS protocol if not set to `WinHttpHandler` #113525
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [browser] managed Diagnostics.Metrics and Diagnostics.Tracing single-threaded #113524
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix compare immediate and branch helper for 2^n #113523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Try improving reliability of TestLongProcessIsWorking #113519
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Update llvm-libunwind to 20.1.0 #113513
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow specifying SDK search paths in global.json #113512
    area-Host
  • Add ms:format-date and ms:format-time test cases #113507
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [Json] Avoid writing to PipeWriter if IAsyncEnumerable throws before first item #113503
    area-System.Text.Json

Merged

  • Tensor.Slice No Longer Copies #113166
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • JIT: Remove `fgReorderBlocks` #113335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • dotnet-runtime-perf-build pipeline triggering fix #113545
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Implement software write watch for GC heap feature for arm32. #113017
    tenet-performance, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix bad constant folding of (0 shift x) => x #113493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: introduce durable EH region ID #113497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix missing ServiceCallSite.Key causing an unkeyed cache entry to be overwritten by a keyed instance #113343
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Update to Ubuntu 25.04 #113405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Remove unnecessary parameter for SBOM generation #113544
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • Add trim-safe ValidationContext constructor #113426
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Clear diagnostic headers on request reuse #113342
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HttpStress] [SslStress] Run stress tests nightly against staging branches #113479
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/9.0-staging] [HttpStress] [SslStress] Run stress tests nightly against staging branches #113476
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • new perf-build pipeline added #113221
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Host: fix Cancellation not aborting Start in some cases #113442
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Fix double dispose of GCHandle in BrowserWebSocket #113464
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix JitDisasmDiffable #113161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Perform additional checks in `PEHeaders`. #113048
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix issues in GetKeyedService() and GetKeyedServices() with AnyKey #113137
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • Added in non-generic interfaces for Tensors #113401
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add runtime-nativeaot-outerloop to build analysis #113520
    needs-area-label
  • Fix obsoletion message for SslStream properties #113375
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Disable some named synchronization object tests on Windows Server Core #113482
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0] produce SBOM after signing artifacts #113504
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta

Updated

  • Refactoring in AssertrionDesc #113440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consume libraries that we vendor fully by building separately and using a custom prefix path #113176
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix building the sanitizer instrumentation and hooking it into the hosts #112378
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] Change default boot config to dotnet.boot.js #113374
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove `LclVarDsc::_lvArgReg` and `_lvOtherArgReg` #113501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor Sequential/Explicit layout to happen in the same phase where we do Auto layout #113454
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Change ZipBlocks structs to classes #113453
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

  • Refactor `CertFreeCRLContext` #112207

  • Use reflection metadata to represent methods/fields in native layout #113413

    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47615
  • `BuildArgsWithDotnetRun` doesn't forward global properties #47614
    10.0.1xx
  • New `dotnet test` experience should support post-processing of artifacts #47613
    10.0.1xx
  • Make `--interactive` not require boosting MSBuild logger verbosity to `minimal` from `quiet` #47602
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47595
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.2xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47594
  • Add template for dotnet.config to dotnet new #47589

Closed

  • .NET SDK Finalizer Feature Band calculation doesn't match SDK's calculation #43876
  • dotnet run has potentially suspicious handling of global properties #47561
  • Unified Embedded .NET Solution #47588

PullRequests

Created

  • dotnet CLI: Removed CommandLineValidation directory #47619
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • sln-list: Add format options #47618
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: Removed .Designer files #47617
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add validation for command-line arguments related to new dotnet test #47616
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to AwesomeAssertions #47611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't get produced packages from transitive references in other build passes #47610
    Area-VMR
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #47609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #47608
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #47603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Publish symbols of RuntimeAnalyzers #47598
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use interpolated string handler for logging #47590
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #47569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Update Microsoft.AspNetCore.Watch.BrowserRefresh to net8.0 #47509

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update sln in reaction to the recent file moves #47605
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move src/Installer components under src/Layout for better sharing and consolidation #47597

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47559

  • Extract version badge generation from redist-installer.proj #47544
